body:
Seems to me that allowing

```
func f() {
  return g()
}
```

when both `g` and `f` function have no return values is, at the very least,
bad for readability. It looks like something is being returned when it is
not.


On 20 March 2015 at 08:50, Ian Lance Taylor <notifications@github.com>
wrote:

> I think we actually discussed that at some point, but I've forgotten what
> the conclusion was. @griesemer <https://github.com/griesemer> do you
> remember?
